job_tasks.phrase: align the products in EXIN's certification portfolio are aligned with the needs of the market
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of how the certification products relate to market demands and business strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: translating internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms
job_tasks.justification: This involves translating business or product requirements (guidelines) into technical specifications (ML algorithms).

job_tasks.phrase: maintain legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to consider business constraints and ethical considerations in the implementation of technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: integrating generative AI solutions into our processes
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions the integration of generative AI, a core aspect of modeling in this context.

job_tasks.phrase: translating internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms
job_tasks.justification: This involves the practical application and implementation of ML algorithms, which is a form of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the creation and upkeep of machine learning algorithms, a central modeling activity.

job_tasks.phrase: review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis
job_tasks.justification: Item and test analysis are statistical methods used to evaluate and improve educational assessments, falling under model evaluation and refinement.

job_tasks.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses
job_tasks.justification: Test analysis and root cause analysis on exam products imply an iterative process of model improvement and troubleshooting.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing exam products in the various systems
job_tasks.justification: This suggests the integration and deployment of exam products within existing systems, requiring software development skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing and maintaining exam products
job_tasks.justification: This involves coordinating the development and implementation of exam products, which often requires software integration and management.

job_tasks.phrase: Preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
job_tasks.justification: This likely involves developing tools or systems to facilitate customer support, which can involve software development.
Maintaining algorithms in a production context often involves operational aspects like monitoring and updates.

job_tasks.phrase: Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
job_tasks.justification: While primarily learning, staying up-to-date in AI/ML is crucial for maintaining and evolving operational systems.

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes the development and maintenance of machine learning algorithms, including their analysis and improvement. While generative AI is mentioned, the core focus is on the underlying algorithms and their application within an educational measurement context, aligning more with the predictive and analytical aspects of an ML Engineer.
